content:
In the village in the Sumy region, Russian aviation dropped 9 fugas aviation bombs with a correction module and 14 managed aviation bombs in the last day.

About thisreportedSumy Regional Military Administration.

In addition to airbombs, Velika Pisarivka was also fired at mortars (24 explosions), rocket launchers (20 explosions), artillery (20 explosions).

As a result of Russian blows, a non -residential building, a shop, a branch of the house of culture, a library, a center of cultural services, a hospital department, a kindergarten, 15 private households, a multi -storey building, a gas pipeline, a gas pipeline were damaged.

As a result of the air strike, one inhabitant of the community was killed. Another local resident was injured.

BeforeThe Armyinform reportedAbout the shelling of Sumy region.
title: 23 aircraft per day was thrown into the Great Pisarivka
description: This was reported by the Sumy Regional Military Administration. In addition to aviation, big ...
author: Army Inform
